criteria: 80% unit test coverage; All integration tests passing; SAST/SCA scans report no new critical/high vulnerabilities.
success_metrics: CI pipeline passes for all PRs; Registration endpoint is stable and validated.

success_metrics: Account recovery is secure and reliable. Audit logging is functional.

success_metrics: GDPR 'right to be forgotten' is verifiably implemented and reliable.
